summary: New armor set - cuirass, gauntlets, boots and headband. New light shield, wood bow, one handed dagger, amulet and ring.
descriptionHtml:
This mod added into the game new armor set - cuirass, gauntlets, boots and headband for person type Dimonized UNP (by autor - dimon99) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709. Next are into the game added new light shield, wood bow, one handed dagger, amulet and ring. All things, outside amulet and ring, possibly upgrade after acquired Perk Arcane Blacksmith. 
New ingredients, required for making these things, possibly extract from hunting animals or chopping wood.
author: pegas
